com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.dom.events

Interface DOMMouseEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DOMEvent, DOMUIEvent, DOMUIEventModifier 

    public interface DOMMouseEvent
extends DOMUIEventModifier
    Represents events that occur due to the user interacting with a pointing device (such as a mouse). Common events using this interface include click, dblclick, mouseup, mousedown.
    表示由于用户与定点设备（例如鼠标）交互而发生的事件。使用此界面的常见事件包括click，dblclick，mouseup，mousedown。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getButton()
      Indicates which button was pressed on the mouse to trigger the event.
      指示在鼠标上按下哪个按钮来触发事件。
      int getClientX()
      The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in local (DOM content) coordinates.
      鼠标指针的X坐标（本地（DOM内容）坐标）。
      int getClientY()
      The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer in local (DOM content) coordinates.
      鼠标指针的Y坐标（本地（DOM内容）坐标）。
      int getScreenX()
      The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in global (screen) coordinates.
      鼠标指针的X坐标（全局（屏幕）坐标）。
      int getScreenY()
      The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer in global (screen) coordinates.
      鼠标指针的Y坐标（全局（屏幕）坐标）。

    • Method Detail

      • getClientX

        int getClientX()
        The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in local (DOM content) coordinates. For example, clicking in the top-left corner of the client area will always result in a mouse event with a clientX value of 0, regardless of whether the page is scrolled horizontally.
        鼠标指针的X坐标（本地（DOM内容）坐标）。例如，单击客户区的左上角将始终导致clientX值为0的鼠标事件，而不管页面是否水平滚动。
        Returns:
        a number. 一个号码。

      • getClientY

        int getClientY()
        The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer in local (DOM content) coordinates. For example, clicking in the top-left corner of the client area will always result in a mouse event with a clientY value of 0, regardless of whether the page is scrolled vertically.
        鼠标指针的Y坐标（本地（DOM内容）坐标）。例如，单击客户区的左上角将始终导致clientY值为0的鼠标事件，而不管页面是否垂直滚动。
        Returns:
        a number. 一个号码。

      • getScreenX

        int getScreenX()
        The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in global (screen) coordinates.
        鼠标指针的X坐标（全局（屏幕）坐标）。
        Returns:
        the offset from the left side of the screen in pixels. 与屏幕左侧的偏移量（以像素为单位）。

      • getScreenY

        int getScreenY()
        The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer in global (screen) coordinates.
        鼠标指针的Y坐标（全局（屏幕）坐标）。
        Returns:
        the offset from the top of the screen in pixels. 与屏幕顶部的偏移量（以像素为单位）。

      • getButton

        int getButton()
        Indicates which button was pressed on the mouse to trigger the event.
        指示在鼠标上按下哪个按钮来触发事件。
        Returns:
        A number representing a given button:
      • -1: No button pressed
      • 0: Main button pressed, usually the left button
      • 1: Auxiliary button pressed, usually the wheel button or the middle button (if present)
      • 2: Secondary button pressed, usually the right button
      • 3: Fourth button, typically the Browser Back button
      • 4: Fifth button, typically the Browser Forward button
        • 代表给定按钮的数字：
